text:
GWEN STEFANI UPDATES ON BLAKE SHELTON AND THE VOICE USA

'She is either ageless or freeze-dried': Fans go wild after learning Gwen Stefani just turned 53 as she has been able to retain her youthful looks Several followers took to social media to express their shock as she appears every bit the Hollaback Girl who burst onto the scene with in 1995. 'Gwen is either ageless or freeze-dried,' wrote one fan. Gwen Stefani shocks fans over turning 53 because she still looks young

Gwen Stefani shows off her luxurious birthday gifts and cake as she celebrates turning 53: 'My boys got me this' Gwen Stefani showcased a few of her special birthday gifts to her fans and followers, which included a Balenciaga bag from her 'boys', a Gucci suitcase, and a delicious cake. Gwen Stefani shows off her luxurious birthday gifts and cake

Blake Shelton pays tribute to wife Gwen Stefani as he wishes her a happy 53rd birthday: 'I love you so much' Blake Shelton gushed over his wife of more than a year, Gwen Stefani, on her 53rd birthday. He wrote in a TikTok, 'Happy birthday to my beautiful wife @gwenstefani!! I love you so freakin much!!' Blake Shelton pays tribute to wife Gwen Stefani on her 53rd birthday

'That melts me when I see it': Gwen Stefani gets emotional when shown a photo of first red carpet appearance with Blake Shelton six years ago Gwen Stefani became a little emotional while discussing her first red carpet appearance alongside Blake Shelton. The 53-year-old singer-songwriter discussed it on The Kelly Clarkson Show. Gwen Stefani talks first red carpet appearance with Blake Shelton

All that's missing is an airplane! Gwen Stefani looks as if she is about to go parachuting in green suit... but doesn't forget the glam with red lips The 52-year-old performer posed for a snap in what appeared to be a dressing area, and she also penned a short message in her post's caption that read: 'These boots always got me feeling like..' Gwen Stefani looks as if she is about to go parachuting in green suit

The Voice: Camila Cabello scores four-chair singer Andrew Igbokidi as new coach builds strong team The 25-year-old singer scored four-chair singer Andrew Igbokidi as the new coach continued to build a formidable team on Monday's episode of The Voice on NBC. The Voice: Camila Cabello scores four-chair singer Andrew Igbokidi

The Voice: Blake Shelton and wife Gwen Stefani team up to help each other win over contestants Blake Shelton, 46, and wife Gwen Stefani, 52, teamed up to help each other win over contestants as the blind auditions continued on Tuesday's episode of The Voice. The Voice: Blake Shelton and wife Gwen Stefani team up on NBC show

Gwen Stefani, 52, shows off her VERY smooth complexion as she sports a form-fitting pink dress in new promo video for The Voice Gwen Stefani was showcasing her very youthful appearance in a new promotional video for the upcoming series of The Voice in America. Gwen Stefani shows off her VERY smooth complexion

The Voice: Camila Cabello debuts as coach and quickly blocks Gwen Stefani as blind auditions begin The 25-year-old pop star while making her debut on The Voice on Monday immediately blocked Gwen Stefani, 52, as the blind auditions kicked off on the NBC singing show. The Voice: Camila Cabello blocks Gwen Stefani as blind auditions begin

Gwen Stefani cuts a fashionable figure in pink dress and tights in promotional photos from set of The Voice Gwen Stefani looked fashionable in promotional photos from The Voice set she posted Monday. The 52-year-old singer-songwriter wore a pink dress emblazoned with a floral pattern. Gwen Stefani cuts a fashionable figure in pink dress and tights

Camila Cabello shares a brief blooper reel before she makes her debut as a judge on NBC's The Voice Just hours before she makes her debut as a judge on NBC's The Voice, Camila Cabello is sharing a brief blooper reel with her fans. Camila Cabello shares a brief blooper reel for NBC's The Voice

Blake Shelton gives his wife Gwen Stefani a tour of the Grand Ole Opry for the first time ahead of their special performance on the iconic stage together in Nashville Blake Shelton and Gwen Stefani made a stop by the iconic country music stage, The Grand Ole Opry, in Nashville, where the two jumped on stage together and received standing ovations. Blake Shelton gives Gwen Stefani a tour of the Grand Ole Opry

Gwen Stefani, 52, appears incredibly youthful in a semi-sheer dress as she chats up her new makeup line: 'Living my glam girl fantasy' Gwen Stefani appeared ageless on the cover of LuisaViaroma Magazine. The Grammy winner looked much younger than her 52 years on the cover of the luxury fashion magazine. Gwen Stefani, 52, appears incredibly youthful in a semi-sheer dress

Gwen Stefani shares glam shots in full makeup while promoting season 22 of The Voice on social media The 52-year-old singer shared glam shots on social media on Thursday while promoting the upcoming season of The Voice on NBC. Gwen Stefani shares glam shots while promoting season 22 of The Voice

Gwen Stefani shows off flawless complexion in glamorous backstage selfie: 'Daydreamy' Gwen Stefani shared her flawless complexion in a selfie she posted to Instagram on Monday. The 52-year-old singer-songwriter showed off her tan skin and full lips covered in gloss. Gwen Stefani shows off flawless face in backstage selfie: 'Daydreamy'

Gwen Stefani gushes over son Zuma on his 14th birthday... as his dad Gavin Rossdale shares heartfelt tribute Gwen Stefani gushed over his son Zuma on his 14th birthday by puckering up to give him a kiss along with a throwback snap, as his dad Gavin Rossdale shared a heartfelt tribute. Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale wish son Zuma happy 14th birthday

Blake Shelton says his career has taken 'a backseat' to his marriage with Gwen Stefani: 'It's just a new phase of my life' Blake Shelton opened up about his relationship with Gwen Stefani during an interview with Entertainment Tonight that was released on Friday. He opened up about prioritizing his marriage. Blake Shelton says his career has taken 'a backseat' to his marriage

Gwen Stefani meets with a group of fans in Iowa after performing at the HyVee IndyCar Weekend After performing at the Iowa Speedway for the HyVee IndyCar Weekend, singer Gwen Stefani took the time to meet some fans as well. Gwen Stefani meets with a group of fans in Iowa

Halsey flaunts incredible postpartum body in skimpy bikini... and proudly shows off stretch marks with 'baby' tattoo on navel The 27-year-old singer-songwriter - who uses she/they pronouns - took to Instagram to share stunning bikini snaps featuring her incredible postpartum body on Wednesday. Halsey flaunts incredible postpartum body in skimpy bikini

Gwen Stefani, 52, wears sexy nude illusion top to perform Light My Fire with Sean Paul on Jimmy Kimmel Live! Three-time Grammy winner Gwen Stefani wore a sexy nude illusion top in Hollywood on Wednesday to pre-tape tonight's episode of Jimmy Kimmel Live! Gwen Stefani, 52, wears sexy nude illusion top on Jimmy Kimmel Live!

Gwen Stefani rocks racy lace-up patterned dress with mesh alongside Sean Paul in the Light My Fire music video Orange County Girl Gwen Stefani was featured in the 'Rocksteady Boss' in Jamaican reggae rapper Sean Paul's Light My Fire music video, which dropped Wednesday. Gwen Stefani rocks racy lace-up patterned dress with mesh

Halsey pays tribute to Gwen Stefani in a cropped tee with a print of her face... as the No Doubt frontwoman responds: 'Love your shirt!' Halsey was active on Instagram on Monday as she shared two new photos wearing a shirt with Gwen Stefani's image. She paid tribute as she rocked a tee with the No Doubt frontwoman's face. Halsey wears a cropped t-shirt with Gwen Stefani's face printed on it

Gwen Stefani pays tribute to Blake Shelton on first wedding anniversary, gushing, '1 year down, forever to go'... as he reciprocates the feeling Gwen Stefani paid tribute to Blake Shelton on their first wedding anniversary, gushing, '1 year down, forever to go'... as country crooner reciprocates, 'Thank you for saying yes!' Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton celebrate first wedding anniversary

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton make a fashionable touchdown in sunny California ahead of Blake's big 46th birthday celebration Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton looked stylish and ready to celebrate Blake's 46th birthday as they landed in California ahead of his performance at the Country Summer Music Festival. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton land in California on Blake's 46th bday

Gwen Stefani oozes summery flair in massive frilly dress as she poses up with dapper husband Blake Shelton at AFI Lifetime Achievement Awards Gwen Stefani oozed summery flair as she and her husband Blake Shelton attended the AFI Lifetime Achievement Awards honoring Julie Andrews in Hollywood on Thursday. Gwen and Blake glow at AFI Lifetime Achievement Awards

Julie Andrews, 86, looks gorgeous as she attends the 48th AFI Life Achievement Award Gala Tribute where she is honored Julie Andrews looked younger than her years as she attended the 48th AFI Life Achievement Award Gala. She was honored at the event, where stars like Gwen Stefani were also in attendance. Julie Andrews attends the 48th AFI Life Achievement Award Gala Tribute

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton hug and kiss on stage after performing a surprise duet at the Hollywood Bowl's 100th Anniversary Opening Night Gwen Stefani kicked off the Hollywood Bowl's 100th season as she performed with the Los Angeles Philharmonic on Friday. The singer and husband Blake Shelton performed a surprise duet. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton kiss on stage at the Hollywood Bowl

Gwen Stefani keeps it casual as she and husband Blake Shelton attend her son Zuma's baseball game in LA The pop star who married the country crooner in 2021, donned a padded fawn bomber jacket and plaid trousers for the outing. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton seen at her son's baseball game

Gwen Stefani cuts a casual figure in a checked shirt and trousers as she joins son Zuma, 13, for his baseball game The No Doubt front woman, 52, layered the casual look over a black sweater emblazoned with the words 'Good Karma'. Gwen Stefani joins son Zuma, 13, for his baseball game in Los Angeles

Are these the most daring celeb wedding dresses of all time? After Kourtney Kardashian sizzled in her D&G mini corseted frock, Femail reveals the star brides who flashed the flesh and frills Most brides opt for a classic long white or ivory wedding dress during their romantic nuptials, however some celebrities tend to push the fashion boundaries and go for a more daring look. Are these the most daring celeb wedding dresses of all time?

Camila Cabello announces she will join The Voice as a coach in a fun video with fellow coaches Gwen Stefani, John Legend and Blake Shelton Camila Cabello will get ready to rumble with Gwen Stefani, Blake Shelton and John Legend on the upcoming 22nd season of The Voice. The pop sensation announced her new role on Sunday. Camila Cabello announces she will join The Voice as a coach this fall

Gavin Rossdale plants passionate kiss on girlfriend Courtlyn Cannan while attending his son Zuma's baseball game in Los Angeles The performer shares Zuma, as well as his other sons Kingston and Apollo, aged 15 and eight, respectively, with his former wife Gwen Stefani, from whom he has been divorced for several years. Gavin Rossdale plants a kiss on Courtlyn Cannan at a baseball game

Gwen Stefani is stylish in black and white ensemble as she and Blake Shelton spend Mother's Day at her parents' home Gwen Stefani was the picture of class and style in black and white ensemble when she and Blake Shelton spent part of their Mother's Day celebration at her parents' home. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton spend Mother's Day at her parents' home

Gwen Stefani says it was 'really fun' doing her own makeup for the 2022 Met Gala after her makeup artist canceled last-minute Gwen Stefani turned heads in a neon yellow Vera Wang bralette and billowing skirt as well as a gorgeous palette of makeup when she walked the red carpet at the 2022 Met Gala on Monday. Gwen Stefani says it was 'really fun' doing own makeup for Met Gala

All grown up! Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale's son Kingston, 15, is almost as tall as his rocker dad as the pair enjoy dinner outing together It seems like only yesterday the exes were busy raising a young child together but Kingston looked like a dapper gentleman as he arrived to Larsen's Steakhouse in Encino on Wednesday. Gwen Stefani's son Kingston,15, is almost as tall as his dad Gavin

2022 Met Gala: Gwen Stefani gorgeous in neon chartreuse green ensemble as she drops jaws at the glitzy gathering The Grammy Award-winning artist, 52, donned a neon chartreuse green ensemble of a top, long gloves and a billowing gown with intricate tulle bows around the waist to the event. 2022 Met Gala: Gwen Stefani gorgeous in chartreuse green ensemble

Gwen Stefani, 52, is completely wrinkle free as she shares close-up car selfies... but is it the work of a very good filter? Gwen Stefani looked like she was half her age in new selfies shared to social media on Sunday. The 52-year-old singer was wrinkle free as her skin looked incredibly smooth. Gwen Stefani is completely wrinkle free at age 52 in selfies

Gwen Stefani and ex-husband Gavin Rossdale keep their distance in the stands as they attend their son Zuma's baseball game in LA Gwen Stefani , 52, and her ex-husband Gavin Rossdale, 56, continue to give each other the silent treatment as they attend their son Zuma's baseball game separately in Los Angeles on Saturday. Gwen Stefani and ex-husband Gavin Rossdale ignore each other in LA

Gwen Stefani glams up to celebrate Easter Sunday at her father's LA home... after spending Holy Saturday in Oklahoma The 52-year-old Grammy winner wore a colorful-printed maxi-dress beneath a blue jean jacket and black strappy heels for the family festivities Gwen Stefani glams up to spend Easter Sunday at her father's LA home

Gwen Stefani celebrates Holy Saturday with Blake Shelton, her sons, and Carson Daly in Oklahoma ahead of Easter Gwen Stefani took to Instagram to share photos celebrating Holy Saturday ahead of Easter. She enjoyed the day in Oklahoma with husband Blake Shelton, her sons, and Carson Daly. Gwen Stefani celebrates Holy Saturday in Oklahoma ahead of Easter

Gwen Stefani shares she was up for the role Angelina Jolie landed opposite Brad Pitt in the 2005 film Mr And Mrs Smith: 'She beat me!' The No Doubt singer went in for auditions, she told Ellen on Wednesday, and one of them was for the starring role opposite Brad Pitt in the 2005 action movie Mr And Mrs Smith. Gwen Stefani reveals she was up for a role Angelina Jolie landed

Gwen Stefani details her first year of marriage to husband Blake Shelton and explains why Ellen couldn't be her maid of honor at their wedding With her first wedding anniversary to Blake Shelton just a few months away, Gwen Stefani is opening up about how her life has changed on Ellen. Gwen Stefani details her first year of marriage to Blake Shelton

Gwen Stefani flashes her abs in denim shorts with fishnet tights in country chic outfit to support husband Blake Shelton at his San Diego concert Gwen Stefani struck a balance between her pop roots and her newly adopted country persona at Blake Shelton's concert. The singer-songwriter, 52, shared several snaps with her 13.3 million followers. Gwen Stefani flashes abs in shorts at Blake Shelton San Diego concert

Gwen Stefani oozes street style in red flannel fringed jacket and blue jeans as she makes her way to her son Zuma's baseball game in LA Gwen Stefani oozes casual-cool in red flannel jacket and blue jeans as she makes her way to her son Zuma's little league baseball game Los Angeles on Thursday. Gwen Stefani dons red flannel jacket at son Zuma's baseball game

Gwen Stefani is 'embarrassed' she forgot to wear her wedding ring during Jimmy Kimmel Live appearance... as she apologizes to husband Blake Shelton: 'I love being married to him' They are set to celebrate their first wedding anniversary on July 3. And during he appearance on the Jimmy Kimmel Live, Gwen Stefani realized she forgot to put her wedding ring back. Gwen Stefani is 'embarrassed' she forgot to wear her wedding ring

Gwen Stefani rocks a black and white look - plus bright blue boots - while arriving at Jimmy Kimmel Live in Los Angeles Gwen Stefani was all smiles while arriving at Jimmy Kimmel Live on Thursday with a rather colorful look. Gwen Stefani rocks a black and white look at Jimmy Kimmel Live

Gwen Stefani rocks bold red jacket as she steps out with husband Blake Shelton in LA They are set to celebrate their first wedding anniversary on July 3. And Blake Shelton, 45, and wife Gwen Stefani, 52, were spotted heading to a football game together in Los Angeles. Gwen Stefani rocks bold red jacket as she steps out with Blake Shelton

Gwen Stefani dons ripped jeans and a colorful fuzzy sweater as she attends son Zuma's baseball game with her youngest Apollo Gwen Stefani stepped out in a stylish, yet comfortable outfit as she and her youngest son Apollo cheered on her middle child Zuma during his baseball game on Saturday. Gwen Stefani dons ripped jeans as she attends son's baseball game

Gwen Stefani models an Anaheim Hillbillies sweat outfit as she goes on a grocery store run with husband Blake Shelton in Los Angeles Gwen Stefani showed off her sporty side as she stepped out for a grocery run with husband Blake Shelton. She rocked a navy blue hoodie and sweatpants that said 'Anaheim hillbillies.' Gwen Stefani dresses in sweatsuit and sneakers for grocery store run

Gwen Stefani showcases taut torso in clinging sheer white top as she apes husband Blake Shelton's country star style in cowgirl boots Gwen Stefani showcased her taut torso in a clinging sheer white top when she was spotted out and about in California this week. The 52-year-old smiled radiantly as she enjoyed an outing in Anaheim. Gwen Stefani showcases taut torso in clinging sheer white top

Kate Hudson playfully threatens to snatch her son Ryder's epic Gwen Stefani t-shirt... but the No Doubt frontwoman promises to give the actress 'something better' 'Better put a lock on that closet son cause I'm coming for that tee,' she jokingly captioned the snap, which unexpectedly earned recognition from Stefani. Gwen Stefani leaves a comment on Kate Hudson's photo of her son

Gwen Stefani and ex-husband Gavin Rossdale attend their son Apollo's football game separately in LA They filed for divorce back in 2015 after 13 years of marriage and three children. Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale attend their son's football game

Gwen Stefani, 52, wows on stage in a bright yellow and black tiger-print romper and fishnet tights during Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest in LA Gwen Stefani got football fans majorly pumped up for Sunday's big game as she performed during the Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest at the Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles. Gwen Stefani performs during Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest in LA

Halsey rocks a brown mini-dress before performing at the first night of the 2022 Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest in Los Angeles Halsey stepped out with a stylish look while hitting the red carpet at the 2022 Bud Light Super Bowl Music Fest. Halsey rocks a brown mini-dress at the Super Bowl Music Fest

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton hold hands as they take in her son Apollo's baseball game in Los Angeles where her ex Gavin Rossdale is also seen Gwen Stefani showed off her fashion taste at a baseball game with Blake Shelton and her ex-husband, Gavin Rossdale on Sunday. The 52-year-old singer stunned as she wore a funky outfit. Gwen Stefani looks chic at a ball game with Blake Shelton and her ex

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton pack on PDA in private box during first-ever NASCAR race at LA Coliseum... with her sons also in attendance Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton only had eyes for each other when they packed on PDA in a private box during the first-ever NASCAR race at the L.A. Coliseum on Sunday. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton pack on PDA at NASCAR race in LA

Gwen Stefani shows funky fashion sense in floral jacket and ripped jeans while grocery shopping The 52-year-old singer showed her inimitable fashion sense on Monday while grocery shopping in West Hollywood, California. Gwen Stefani shows funky fashion sense while grocery shopping

EXCLUSIVE: Gavin Rossdale enjoys quality time with ALL FOUR children including eldest Daisy Lowe... as they celebrate her 33rd birthday with outing to Universal Studios Singer Gavin Rossdale surfaced this week in Los Angeles in a rare public sighting with all four of his children. They were spotted enjoying the attractions at Universal Studios Hollywood. Gavin grabs quality time with ALL FOUR children at Universal Studios

Gwen Stefani is overcome with puppy love while snapping several selfies with her pampered pooch Ginger Gwen Stefani shared several shots with her dog, Ginger, to her Instagram Story on Sunday afternoon. The 52-year-old No Doubt frontwoman appeared to be enjoying her time with her pooch. Gwen Stefani snaps several selfies with her pampered pooch Ginger

Gwen Stefani is ever the cool mom in matching sweats and hoodie as she and eldest son Kingston run errands On Saturday afternoon, the 52-year-old No Doubt singer could be seen stepping out with her eldest son Kingston, 15, as they went shopping together. Gwen Stefani is ever the cool mom in matching sweats and hoodie

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton touch down at Van Nuys airport after spending some quality time together in Oklahoma Gwen Stefani and husband Blake Shelton touched down in LA on Tuesday, following their relaxing trip to Oklahoma. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton return to LA after trip to Oklahoma

Gwen Stefani sports sweats and a coat as she boards a private airplane with Blake Shelton in LA... after first Christmas as a married couple The 52-year-old singer looked cozy wearing sweats and a jacket while her country crooner beau trailed behind carrying a massive framed gift after enjoying the holiday season with her children. Gwen Stefani sports sweats at the airport with Blake Shelton in LA

Strictly bosses 'keen to get Anne-Marie on the main series' after singer triumphed on show's Christmas special with Graziano Di Prima Anne-Marie, 30, could appear on the main series of Strictly Come Dancing after triumphing professional dancer Graziano Di Prima, 27, on the Christmas special this year. Anne-Marie 'to appear on main series of Strictly Come Dancing'

Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton celebrate first Christmas as married couple with Italian pasta feast The 52-year-old pop singe and Blake Shelton, 45, celebrated their first Christmas together as a married couple with a homemade Italian family feast. Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton celebrate Christmas as married couple

Gwen Stefani rocks a raven wig and snowman hoodie on Instagram as she promotes her holiday madness Christmas game Gwen Stefani didn't look like her usual self while appearing on Instagram on Thursday night. She was clad in a raven wig as she posted content for her 12.8 million followers. Gwen Stefani rocks wig on Instagram as she promotes her Christmas game

Gwen Stefani, 52, is an ageless beauty as she lights up stage at Spotify bash and teases husband Blake Shelton for having 'lost on The Voice tonight' Gwen Stefani was agelessly radiant when she hit the stage this Tuesday night at the Spotify Celebrates Wrapped With A Totally Normal Party event held in Los Angeles. Gwen, 52, is an ageless beauty as she lights up stage at Spotify bash

Gavin Rossdale, 56, steps out on lunch date with a brunette mystery woman and her adorable pet pooch in LA Gavin Rossdale was spotted enjoying lunch in Los Angeles with a stunning brunette on Friday afternoon. Gavin Rossdale, 56, steps out on lunch date with a mystery woman

Gwen Stefani has 'too much fun' at Target in a bold red look as she promotes the deluxe edition of her Christmas album Gwen Stefani was red hot as she hit her local Target on Friday in a bright look. She wore track pants and a bomber jacket as she posed for pictures on a shopping cart. Gwen Stefani hits Target in red as she promotes her Christmas album

Gwen Stefani certainly seems in the holiday spirit as she rocks bold red and black ensemble while out in LA Gwen Stefani oozed Christmas glow and spirit in a bold red and black ensemble when she stepped out from her Los Angeles home to take care of some business on Monday. Gwen Stefani certainly seems in holiday spirit out in LA

The Voice: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton proudly show off their wedding rings on results episode The 52-year-old No Doubt singer and Blake Shelton, 45, excitedly showed off their wedding rings on The Voice on Tuesday after getting married in July at the country star's Oklahoma ranch. The Voice: Gwen Stefani and Blake Shelton show off their wedding rings

Gwen Stefani rocks a cute Santa outfit as she promotes The Wonderful World of Disney: Magical Holiday Celebration Gwen Stefani looked ready for the holidays to begin in a series of photos she posted to Instagram. The singer, 52, wore a dress patterned like Santa's suit, red with fuzzy white trim. Gwen Stefani rocks cute Santa outfit for magical Disney holiday show

Gwen Stefani is 'grateful' for her first Thanksgiving as Blake Shelton's wife as they spend the holiday in Oklahoma with her children and parents The Don't Speak singer took to Instagram to share her joy over her new marital status as she shared images from the big day which they spent in Oklahoma. She showed images of Blake cooking. Gwen Stefani 'grateful' for first Thanksgiving as Blake Shelton's wife

Gwen Stefani, Julianne Hough, Chance The Rapper and more lend their star power to The Wonderful World of Disney: Magical Holiday Celebration special on ABC Disney recruited some of the biggest names in entertainment for its sixth-annual The Wonderful World of Disney: Magical Holiday Celebration special, which airs Sunday on ABC. Gwen Stefani performs during Disney's Magical Holiday Celebration

Gwen Stefani wears winter white and gets into the festive spirit while filming a Christmas special at Disneyland Gwen Stefani channeled Disney princess energy for her performance at Disneyland. She wore a white gown to the event with a patterned flower design. Her blonde hair was in a ponytail. Gwen Stefani looks like a princess after a performance at Disneyland

Inside the twisted decline of celebrity fashion favorite Von Dutch: Docuseries exposes bitter scandals that destroyed the billion dollar brand - from fist fights between founders to creator's MURDER conviction The three-part series, called #TheCurseofVonDutch: A Brand to Die For, aired on November 18. It revealed the behind-the-scenes decline of the brand, which shot to global fame in the early 2000s. The twisted fall of fashion brand Von Dutch exposed in new docuseries
